name: Daily Home Care
Description: We send a doctor to visit the patient at home to diagnose and treat the illnesses. He or she may also periodically review the home health care needs.

details.detailTitle: We are here to help when you need us
details.detailDescription: By helping with daily activities, our caregivers enable clients to maintain their normal daily routines. Hourly home care allows clients to use our caregivers on an hourly or as-needed basis. Surrounded by their possessions, pets, and a familiar environment, our clients receive the support they need to enjoy their regular activities and continue living well at home.
details.personalCare: Assisting with walking from bed to wheelchair. Bathing, dressing and grooming assistance. Medication reminders. Safety and fall prevention. Status reporting to family
details.lifeStyleSupport: Light housekeeping. Meal preparation and nutrition. Laundry and change of bed linens. Grocery shopping and errands. Transportation to social & recreational activities.

name: Hourly Home Care
Description: The most common form of home health care. It is a type of nursing care that depends on the individual needs. Through consultation with the doctor, a registered nurse will set up a plan of care.

details.detailTitle: We are here to help when you need us
details.detailDescription: By helping with daily activities, our caregivers enable clients to maintain their normal daily routines. Hourly home care allows clients to use our caregivers on an hourly or as-needed basis. Surrounded by their possessions, pets, and a familiar environment, our clients receive the support they need to enjoy their regular activities and continue living well at home.

details.lifeStyleSupport: Light housekeeping. Meal preparation and nutrition. Laundry and change of bed linens. Grocery shopping and errands. Transportation to social & recreational activities.

name: Specialized Care
Description: Physical / mental / occupational care provide patients with help on relearning how to perform daily duties or improve their speech after a severe illness or injury.

details.detailTitle: We are here to help when you need us

name: Advanced Care
Description: Medical social workers provide various services to the patient, including counseling and locating community resources to help the patient in his or her recovery.

details.detailTitle: We are here to help when you need us
details.detailDescription: By helping with daily activities, our caregivers enable clients to maintain their normal daily routines. Surrounded by their possessions, pets, and a familiar environment, our clients receive the support they need to enjoy their regular activities and continue living well at home.

details.lifeStyleSupport: Light housekeeping. Meal preparation and nutrition. Laundry and change of bed linens. Grocery shopping and errands. Transportation to social & recreational activities.

name: Hospital to Home Care
Description: Help the patient with his or her basic personal needs such as getting out of bed, walking, bathing, and dressing. Some aides have received specialized training under the supervision of a nurse.

details.detailTitle: We are here to help when you need us

Surrounded by their possessions, pets, and a familiar environment, our clients receive the support they need to enjoy their regular activities and continue living well at home.

name: Respite Home Care
Description: While a patient is being medically cared for in the home, a homemaker or person who helps with chores or tasks can maintain the household with various housekeeping tasks.
